MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-OCT-2020 18:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the KA3 postcode area of Kilmarnock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:00pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network located near Ogilvie Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:46pm on Tuesday, 13 October 2020
